name: That New Platformer Game
description:
A game where you can jump around and collect coins. You can post your score and compete with the community through the discussion tab. Game updated daily. If the game loads and there is just a black screen come back later and it should be fixed. The black screen only occurs when this release is not matched with the one on the repository. Beta version may not work at times but it will always be fixed.

Controls:

Left arrow to move left

Right arrow to move right

Up arrow to jump

r to reload

m to break the game(might be removed)

Donations can be made via
